item.title: Common probability distributions
item.description: Some common probability distributions and their properties # uniform (discrete and continuous) # bernoulli # binomial # normal (gaussian) # student-t # multinoulli # categorical # dirichlet # gumbel # type-1 gumbel # type-2 gumbel # weibull # chi-squared # logistic # laplace # cauchy # log-normal # pareto # gamma # special case of the gamma: exponential distribution # special case of the gamma: beta distribution # poisson # multivariate normal distribution # multivariate student t #
